attr.title: Walthros: Renewal
attr.desc: A turn-based RPG about a kind-hearted doofus trying to make tough times a little easier. Set in Walthros -- a world of floating fish, chill cats, and long-buried secrets -- Bob's routine excavation job spirals into something much bigger when he uncovers a discovery that could change history forever.
attr.inst: Purchase the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/1317270/Walthros_Renewal and download using the following download_depot/DepotDownload details: -app 1317270 -depot 1317271 -manifest 6884196317892834424. Copy the game files walthrosrenewal.rpg and BurpinBros.rpg to the port directory.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game from [https://store.steampowered.com/app/1317270/Walthros\_Renewal](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1317270/Walthros_Renewal) and download using the following download\_depot/DepotDownload details: `-app 1317270 -depot 1317271 -manifest 6884196317892834424`. Copy the game files `walthrosrenewal.rpg` and `BurpinBros.rpg` to the port directory.
